q_ch: 所有订单中总共做的前三多的商品是什么？
q_en: What are the top three products made in all orders in total?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the top three products made in all orders. Here's a neat table for you:

| Rank | Product Description | Attributes     | Total Quantity |
|------|---------------------|----------------|----------------|
| 1    | Skirt               | Purple, M size | 540            |
| 2    | Skirt               | Pink, M size   | 345            |
| 3    | T-shirt             | Yellow, S size | 260            |

Looks like skirts are quite popular! 😄 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, p.attributes, pt.description, SUM(op.number) as total_quantity FROM order_product op JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of each product made in all orders
